pullrequest.title: Apply Force/Torque dialog: Activate window when visual clicked

content.raw: That's a good point. I think I hadn't done this before because once we have the pink circles, when we click on the model, we don't know if we should attach the circles to force or torque. But I guess we could default to force... I'll do that.
content.html: That's a good point. I think I hadn't done this before because once we have the pink circles, when we click on the model, we don't know if we should attach the circles to force or torque. But I guess we could default to force... I'll do that.
